DLRU.Label: DLRU
DLRU.Hint: A spritesheet that animates in the order Down, Left, Right, Up.

DLRUReduced.Label: DLRUReduced
DLRUReduced.Hint: A spritesheet that animates in the order Down, Left, Right, Up, but duplicates the first frame in each row.

Eight.Label: 8-Directional
Eight.Hint: A spritesheet that has all four orthogonal directions and all four diagonal directions.

Diagonal.Label: Diagonal
Diagonal.Hint: A spritesheet that has all four diagonal directions.

Nihey.Label: Nihey
Nihey.Hint: A spritesheet generated by Nihey's Retro Sprite Creator.
